comments.author: AspenForester
comments.body: Are these really PowerShell issues or Windows issues?  Maybe submit this via Windows Feedback Hub, too?

comments.author: AspenForester
comments.body:
How astonishingly rude. They may just be nameless, faceless "Microsoft
employees" to you, but the members of the PowerShell team are my friends,
and this sort of behavior is unacceptable.

comments.author: shogerr
comments.body: You act like history doesn't follow an individual, ie Microsoft. No one has forced you or your peers to work for a company that has a reputation like Microsoft's. You represent a negative actor in the computing world by association alone; whether you accept that fully or not. Removing my posted issues to the MS projects. Thank God you all can't purchase Git.
